headline: PHILIPS DOUBLE CRYSTAL DIFFRACTOMETER
description: Double Crystal Diffractometer      Double Crystal Diffractometer   optimized for fast rocking curve analysis of pseudomorphic epitaxial layer structures.
specstable:
Manufacturer Philips
Model DCD 120
Wafer Size Range
Minimum 50 mm
Maximum 200 mm
Controller Type PC Controller Type
Other Information 2.2 kW copper tube
InP Crystal, Angle 31.7 degrees
Measurement range: 26.7 to 36.7 degrees.
Xenon detector
Sample Chucks
  • (1) 2" to 8" universal chuck
  • (1) 7 site 2" chuck
  • (1) Multichuck; (2)2", (1)3", (1)4"
    Window 98
Year of Manufacture 2001
Condition Excellent
